title: Hi-So Sa Orn
overview: Mayrisa's father comes from a rich family, but her mother was poor so she wasn't accepted by her father's family. They went to live on the countryside, where Mayrisa grew up with Aidin, her childhood best friend. One day, her grandmother takes her in and she goes overseas. 10 years later, Mayrisa and Aidin meet again as adults. She doesn't remember him anymore but he recognized her immediately. She was his first love and he's still in love with her, but because of their class differences he's trying to get over her and move on, but is always there when she needs help.
